title: Update BagGallery and homepage sections to use new jute/canvas images and remove model/close-up image boxes

requirements.summary: Add 3801.png and Bg-02-17.jpg to public static assets so they can be loaded from /assets/
acceptanceCriteria: The files exist under frontend/public/assets/ with the exact filenames: frontend/public/assets/3801.png and frontend/public/assets/Bg-02-17.jpg.
The images can be loaded in the browser directly at /assets/3801.png and /assets/Bg-02-17.jpg (HTTP 200).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image as a static public asset with the exact filename so it is accessible at /assets/3801.png.
Add the uploaded image as a static public asset with the exact filename so it is accessible at /assets/Bg-02-17.jpg.

requirements.summary: Replace the BagGallery 'Towel bag' card with a 'Jute' card using /assets/Bg-02-17.jpg and updated alt text
acceptanceCriteria: The BagGallery materials array no longer contains an item with name exactly "Towel bag".
A new (or updated) BagGallery materials item is present with name "Jute" and src exactly "/assets/Bg-02-17.jpg".
The rendered Materials & Craftsmanship grid displays the new Jute bag card image and label.

file_operations.description: Update the materials array to remove the item named "Towel bag" and add/replace it with an item named "Jute" using src "/assets/Bg-02-17.jpg" and matching alt text.

requirements.summary: Replace the BagGallery 'Beaded Clutch' card with a 'Black & White Canvas' card using /assets/3801.png and updated alt text
acceptanceCriteria: The BagGallery materials array no longer contains an item with name exactly "Beaded Clutch".
A new (or updated) BagGallery materials item is present with name "Black & White Canvas" and src exactly "/assets/3801.png".
The previous beaded clutch image (currently referenced as "/assets/LMBG-36600-removebg-preview.png") is no longer used anywhere in the BagGallery materials grid.

file_operations.description: Update the materials array to remove the item named "Beaded Clutch" and add/replace it with an item named "Black & White Canvas" using src "/assets/3801.png" and matching alt text; ensure the materials grid no longer references "/assets/LMBG-36600-removebg-preview.png".

requirements.summary: Remove the two image boxes from the About section so the model and close-up images are no longer displayed
acceptanceCriteria: The About section no longer renders an with src "/assets/generated/gallery-models-bags-1.dim_1200x800.png".
The About section no longer renders an with src "/assets/generated/gallery-bag-closeup-1.dim_1200x800.png".
The About section layout remains visually clean and responsive after removing the image gallery boxes (no broken spacing/overlaps on mobile and desktop).

file_operations.description: Remove (or conditionally omit) the About image gallery grid so it no longer renders images with src "/assets/generated/gallery-models-bags-1.dim_1200x800.png" and "/assets/generated/gallery-bag-closeup-1.dim_1200x800.png"; adjust spacing so the section remains responsive and visually balanced.

requirements.summary: Remove the model image box from the Hero section and keep the hero responsive and visually balanced without model-related alt text
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section no longer renders an with src "/assets/generated/hero-handbag-model.dim_1600x900.png".
The Hero section no longer includes user-facing text that describes a model image in its image alt text (since the model image is removed).
The Hero section remains responsive and visually balanced on mobile and desktop after the image box removal (no empty large media container).

file_operations.description: Remove the hero image container that renders "/assets/generated/hero-handbag-model.dim_1600x900.png" and its model-specific alt text; update the Hero layout/grid so it remains visually balanced and responsive without leaving an empty media column/container.
